synopsis.text:
Kei Katsuragi, a courageous pilot, is thrust into an extraordinary journey when a mission to deploy a groundbreaking weapon, the Space/Time Oscillation Bomb, goes awry. In the war-torn year of 2062, Kei is entrusted with the daunting task of ending a relentless conflict between two formidable superpowers. However, when the bomb prematurely detonates, Kei is catapulted into an alternate dimension, leaving behind a chaotic vortex of intertwined realities and timelines.

Now stranded in a parallel world, Kei finds himself caught in the crossfire between the enigmatic Chilam military forces and the Emaan, a benevolent group of nomads who come to his aid. As he grapples with the consequences of his actions, Kei embarks on a perilous quest to restore the space-time continuum and find his way back home. With the fate of multiple dimensions resting on his shoulders, Kei must navigate this unfamiliar realm and unlock the secrets of the Space/Time Oscillation Bomb to save both his own world and the one he has stumbled upon.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
